This information was shared exclusively with the Ministry of Public Health and Social Welfare to contact the client in the event of the presence of a positive COVID-19 case. 

Restaurants and bars must only do take away or delivery.

These non-essentials businesses, to reopen,  must operate without enabling common areas (food courts, restaurants, playgrounds, waiting spaces, benches to sit, changing tables, and other related spaces).  Also, premises whose services require the client to stay in the premises for a time greater than 30 minutes must set up a booking system and collect information about the customers (name and last name, identity document, address, telephone number). This information was shared exclusively with the Ministry of Public Health and Social Welfare to contact the customer in the event of reporting a positive COVID-19 case on the premises. Restaurants and bars must only do take away or delivery.
